snippet.title: Project: Eden's Garden 「模倣」- Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
16 talented participants enter the game. Only 2 will walk out alive. Don't let history repeat itself. Break the cycle.

Project: Eden's Garden is a non-profit Danganronpa fangame. Taking the formula of the murder-mystery video game and applying it to an entirely new world, with new characters and stories to tell, this is a small project that is dedicated to recreating the magic the works that inspired it.

Behind the Scenes: Making the Trailer (w/Editor's Commentary)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=crwb1xlbqro
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Official Twitter account for Project: Eden's Garden -
https://twitter.com/ProjEdensGarden

Discord Server for Project: Eden's Garden -
http://discord.com/invite/uZvrUCN

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Director: Sean Lusk

Editor: Andrew Moers
https://www.youtube.com/user/parad0xl

Music Composer: Everything Fantasy
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHjnzvSP6NAecvTQ5G92n5A

Lead Artist: Nifast Greentail
https://twitter.com/NGreentail

Poster Artist: SnipSnipArt 
https://twitter.com/SnipSnipArt
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Project: Eden's Garden is looking to expand our team. If interested, please join our Discord server, and look in the FAQ for the application form. Located in the application form is a list of open positions. Thank you for taking the time to watch our trailer, and we hope you look forward to the completion of the project!
